name: build-yours
0:
”Alexa, turn on my clock”
”Alexa, set my clock Party Mode to Matrix”
”Alexa, Change my clock color to blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Build-Yours, the ultimate Alexa skill designed exclusively for controlling your hardware WordClock. Build-Yours seamlessly integrates with your Alexa-enabled devices, allowing you to effortlessly manage your WordClock's functionalities and curate the perfect ambiance in your space.

Device Compatibility and Setup:
Ensure your hardware WordClock device is connected to your Alexa account. No additional hardware is necessary. Simply enable the Build-Yours skill and follow the prompts to begin customizing your WordClock's settings via voice commands.

Core Functionalities:

 Control Brightness: Effortlessly adjust the brightness level of your hardware WordClock to suit your preferences.
 Power On and Off: Easily turn your WordClock on or off using simple voice commands.
 Choose Colors: Personalize your WordClock by selecting from a wide range of colors for the word display.
 Party Mode: Transform your space with vibrant and dynamic transitions to liven up your gatherings.
 Night Mode: Set a calming ambiance with dimmed lighting for peaceful nights.
 Change Effects: Explore various display effects to keep your WordClock engaging and match your style.
 Ambient Light: Utilize your WordClock as an ambient light source to set the perfect mood in your space.

Device Compatibility:
The Build-Yours skill seamlessly integrates with hardware WordClock devices and all Alexa-enabled devices. Link your WordClock to your Alexa account for complete control.
